text:
Ayub Bachchu (; 16 August 1962 – 18 October 2018) was a Bangladeshi musician and singer-songwriter. He was best known as the founding member of rock band LRB. He was a member of the band Feelings and later he joined the band Souls as lead guitarist. He was one the most influential figures in Bangladeshi rock music.
Bachchu died of a heart attack in Dhaka on 18 October 2018 at the age of 56 in Square Hospital of Bangladesh.
